price: Wata ƙungiya daga Mutãnen Littãfi sun yi gũrin su ɓatar da ku, to, ba su ɓatar da kõwa ba fãce kansu, kuma bã su sansancewa!
arabic: وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَوۡ يُضِلُّونَكُمۡ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waddat ṭāifatun min ahli al-kitābi law yuḍillūnakum wamā yuḍillūna illā anfusahum wamā yashʿurūna
